attributes.action: Grace Darling to be subject of new banknote
attributes.additional_details: Grace Darling was a courageous women who saved several lives putting to sea on a night when many men would not have ventured out. The RNLI was formed as a result of her actions. She deserves proper recognition. Putting her on the reverse of a banknote would be a nice way to move towards doing that.

rejection.details:
Suggestions for new characters on bank notes are the responsibility of the Bank of England.
The Bank of England may be contacted by post - The Bank of England, Threadneedle St, London, EC2R 8AH - or by email - enquiries@bankofengland.co.uk
